title: Very bold serif font. Anyone recognize it?
author: cplea

comments.content:
Appears to be Times New Roman Extra Bold, with a bit of horizontal widening:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/times-new-roman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317203002/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/times-new-roman/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/times-new-roman/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317203002im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TimesNewRomanExtraBold_5938.png)
